l_english:: #A courtier propositions you via a lewd image, by Ewan Cowhig Croft
intrigue_temptation.3100.start_desc0: "A servant discretely drops the package next to me. I yawn, barely enduring this woeful feast, and start opening it.\n\nInside is"

intrigue_temptation.3100.end_desc0: "depicting a rather flatteringly-endowed [propositioning_courtier.GetWomanMan] form bent into a "seductive" pose.\n\nI glance around the hall, stunned, only to see [propositioning_courtier.GetTitledFirstNameNoTooltip] staring back at me. [propositioning_courtier.GetSheHe
column2: U] grins, and [propositioning_courtier.GetHerHis] eyebrows start wiggling like frenzied caterpillars."

l_english:: intrigue_temptation.3100.stone_desc0: "a thin stone slab, roughly engraved,"
intrigue_temptation.3100.wax_desc0: "a smelly wax tablet, lazily etched,"
intrigue_temptation.3100.vellum_desc0: "a sheet of vellum, with a blotchy ink sketch"
intrigue_temptation.3100.a.tt0: "Any chaste characters in your court gain a little respect for you"
intrigue_temptation.3100.b.tt0: "I try to coax a secret out of [propositioning_courtier.GetShortUINameNoTooltip]"
intrigue_temptation.3100.wax_c0: "My, the wax is still warm..."
intrigue_temptation.3100.d0: "I think a public viewing is in order."
#While drinking with a courtier, you lead them towards deviancy, by Ewan Cowhig Croft

intrigue_temptation.3110.start_desc0: "A long evening of state-business with [potential_deviant.GetTitledFirstNameNoTooltip] has slowly degenerated into both of us being deep in our cups, slurringly swapping saucy stories.\n\nI have just finished my retelling of a tale"

intrigue_temptation.3110.end_desc0: "when I see an untoward gleam in my companion's eye.\n\nThoughts of blackmail race, unbidden, to my mind. Perhaps [potential_deviant.GetTitledFirstNameNoTooltip] is actually a little keener on this subject than [potential_deviant.GetSheHe] knows?"
intrigue_temptation.3110.0_desc0: "about the forbidden love 'twixt goat and badger,"
intrigue_temptation.3110.1_desc0: "of mournful lust for one's unreachable reflection,"
intrigue_temptation.3110.2_desc0: "of a most unlikely relationship involving a horse,"
intrigue_temptation.3110.3_desc0: "about a lord who loved his land a little #EMP too#! much,"
intrigue_temptation.3110.4_desc0: "involving three lecherous [ROOT.Char.GetFaith.PriestNeuterPlural] and an extremely-worn felt hat,"
intrigue_temptation.3110.5_desc0: "about my grandfather's amorous exploits with a wily fish,"
intrigue_temptation.3110.7_desc0: "involving a bandit's well-loved tree stump,"
intrigue_temptation.3110.8_desc0: "of the seductive charms of some exotic sea monsters,"
intrigue_temptation.3110.9_desc0: "relating the natural proclivities of certain barbaric cultures,"
intrigue_temptation.3110.a0: "I know a few other stories like that..."
intrigue_temptation.3110.a.tt_fail0: "[potential_deviant.GetShortUINameNoTooltip] is repulsed by my lewdness"
intrigue_temptation.3110.b0: "That's #EMP quite#! enough for now, thank you."
#You enjoy a dinner with one of your guests, and try to tempt them into staying, by Ewan Cowhig Croft
intrigue_temptation.3120.desc0: "Tonight, for the dozenth time, I find myself lounging next to a guttering fire with [tempted_guest.GetTitledFirstName]. [tempted_guest.GetHerHis
column2: U] company just feels so natural, so easy, like [tempted_guest.GetSheHe] has been staying in [capital.GetNameNoTooltip] for years instead of weeks.\n\nIf only [tempted_guest.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] agreed to stay permanently, then these long, lazy evenings could last forever. Of course, with the right nudge..."

l_english:: intrigue_temptation.3120.a0: "Let me show you #EMP just#! how hospitable I can be."
intrigue_temptation.3120.b0: "Just ask, and I'll fetch the moon itself."
intrigue_temptation.3120.c0: "A toast to fine, if transient, company!"
#You seduce the spouse of a potential rival to cement the foeship, by Ewan Cowhig Croft

column2:
U] incites me to such blinding rage that, some days, I can scarcely remember why we feud. It matters little now: I hold [rival_main.GetHerHis] [rival_spouse.GetWifeHusband], [rival_spouse.GetFirstName], in my embrace, [rival_spouse.GetHerHis] passions aflame.

Soon, between my snide smiles and some well-paid gossips, [rival_main.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] shall know. I'll make #EMP sure#! that [rival_main.GetFirstNameNoTooltip] knows.

One forbidden kiss will seal this rivalry."

l_english:: intrigue_temptation.3130.a0: "My dear, have you ever kissed a #EMP real#! [ROOT.Char.GetWomanMan]?"
#Flirt openly with courtiers, pleasing some and irritating others, by Ewan Cowhig Croft

intrigue_temptation.3140.desc0: "This morning, I had a delightful encounter with a charming young servant. We joked, we laughed, and we parted with glad hearts, all because I made the effort to be somewhat more personable.\n\nPerhaps I could apply this bout of flirtatious confidence to more than just my personal affairs?"
intrigue_temptation.3140.a0: "I suppose I could make a bit more eye contact..."
intrigue_temptation.3140.b0: "A lingering touch teases the soul."
#Caught chatting up a courtier, you back out, carry on, or double-down, by Ewan Cowhig Croft

intrigue_temptation.3150.desc0: "The solar is just barely illuminated, and [primary_seducee.GetTitledFirstName] and I are pressed close, our lips all but meeting. The night air is cool, but [primary_seducee.GetSheHe] feels molten to the touch, and [primary_seducee.GetHerHis] breath comes in short, ragged gasps.

At just about the worst possible moment, [secondary_seducee.Custom2('MyCharacterIntroduction', ROOT.Char)] strides into the room, already at full bluster.

"Great [ROOT.Char.GetTitleAsNameNoTooltip], we must discuss my accom— oh. I didn't see that you had company.""
intrigue_temptation.3150.a0: "Why, [primary_seducee.GetFirstNameNoTooltip], I didn't see you there!"
intrigue_temptation.3150.b0: "We were just leaving. For somewhere more #EMP private#!."
intrigue_temptation.3150.c.tt_success0: "You take them both for a tumble"
intrigue_temptation.3150.c.tt_success.lovers0: "I become lovers with both of them."
#Sleep with someone who dislikes you for fun or profit, by Ewan Cowhig Croft

column2:
U] [ROOT.Char.Custom('InsultNoun')]!" [sometime_rival.GetTitledFirstName] screams, spittle flying from [sometime_rival.GetHerHis] dung-hole of a mouth. The [sometime_rival.GetWomanMan] seems to have developed something of a vendetta, but today's argument is especially passionate. And projectile.

As [sometime_rival.GetTitledFirstNameNoTooltip] fumes, red in the face and breathing heavily, I swear [sometime_rival.GetHerHis] eyes roam lower on my body, just for a moment, before snapping back up to meet my gaze.

Is it #EMP truly#! rage writ cross [sometime_rival.GetHerHis] features?"

l_english:: intrigue_temptation.3160.b0: "You are not worth the dog's attention, let alone mine."

intrigue_temptation.3161.desc0: "Hours later, the two of us lie in bed, utterly spent, surrounded by torn sheets and broken furniture. For the first time in a week, [sometime_rival.GetTitledFirstNameNoTooltip] and I have finally stopped arguing.\n\nMy sometime-rival's chest rises and falls to a slowly deepening rhythm; any moment now, [sometime_rival.GetSheHe] will doubtless drift off to sleep."
intrigue_temptation.3161.a0: "Perhaps we both always wanted this?"
intrigue_temptation.3161.b0: "I have had better evenings perched atop my privy!"
intrigue_temptation.3161.b_flavour0: "I snatch [sometime_rival.GetHerHis] clothes and run cackling from the room."
malignant_hearsay_modifier_desc0: "The servants and small folk gossip that this person is tied to a suspicious death."
